Uses of Interface
jdraw.framework.DrawContext

  • Packages that use DrawContext 
    Package Description
    jdraw
    Contains the main classes that start the application, trigger the Spring configuration and define the GUI.
    jdraw.figures
    Contains all implementations of figures that can be displayed and manipulated in the JDraw editor.
    jdraw.framework
    Contains all interfaces and implementations of the base framework of the JDraw editor.
    jdraw.std
    Contains standard implementations of framework interfaces.

    • Uses of DrawContext in jdraw

      Methods in jdraw that return DrawContext 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static DrawContext JDraw.getContext()
      Get an interface which represents the context.

    • Uses of DrawContext in jdraw.figures

      Constructors in jdraw.figures with parameters of type DrawContext 
      Constructor Description
      RectTool​(DrawContext context)
      Create a new rectangle tool for the given context.

    • Uses of DrawContext in jdraw.framework

      Methods in jdraw.framework that return DrawContext 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DrawContext DrawView.getContext()
      Returns the context which was assigned to this view.
      Methods in jdraw.framework with parameters of type DrawContext 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DrawTool DrawToolFactory.createTool​(DrawContext context)
      Returns a draw tool operating on the given controller.
      void DrawView.setDrawContext​(DrawContext context)
      Sets the context to be used by this view.
